name: Notion Core Values Identifier
description: Gain Clarity and Confidence for Your BrandEfficiently discover and filter your brand’s core values in just five steps!Are you having trouble choosing what words to use as your core values, that also reflect what you stand for in your brand?If you are either someone…Who needs a no-brainer tool to help you translate your core values into three simple words?Who has no time searching for clear descriptions and synonyms of your chosen core values?Who’s eager to create solid guiding principles for you
features: Who needs a no-brainer tool to help you translate your core values into three simple words?; Who has no time searching for clear descriptions and synonyms of your chosen core values?; Who’s eager to create solid guiding principles for your brand’s actions?; Step-by-step guide check, group, select, and review your results; An intensive and vetted list of word choices; Simplified filters to make grouping and categorizing easy; Clear overview of your final core values with definitions and a list of synonyms; Optimized layout and templated to capture your final three core values easily
